meanings.definition: The state or quality of being infinite.
meanings.sent1: The concept of infinity in mathematics can be quite challenging for students.
meanings.sent2: The universe is said to be filled with infinity, stretching beyond our comprehension.
meanings.sent3: When the kids played hide and seek, they claimed the backyard was an infinity of hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him seemed to have no end, like an infinity of affection.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted a vast, colorful infinity that seemed to go on forever.

meanings.definition: A number greater than any assignable quantity or countable number.
meanings.sent1: In mathematics, infinity is symbolized by the sideways figure 8.
meanings.sent2: The concept of infinity is used in calculus to represent unbounded values.
meanings.sent3: The buffet had so many desserts that it felt like an infinity of choices.
meanings.sent4: As the marathon runner approached the finish line, the cheering crowd seemed like an infinity of supporters.
meanings.sent5: The possibilities in life are like an infinity of paths, waiting to be explored.
